posts.post_content:
Dawwww, isn't it cute?  
  
I generally like all of these [firebreathing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=firebreathing)/shade creatures, but most of them seem to be costed as though they had already been pumped up a bunch.  
  
In any rate, a high toughness red creature?  
Wacky.

posts.post_content:
Outrageously bad. In my opinion, this is worse than [Ashenmoor Cohort](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ashenmoor Cohort) by far. The only thing this card has going for it is the fact that it's a red flier, but not even that would convince me that this card is ever worth putting in a deck.   
  
Perhaps in Imp tribal. I have a feeling that it would go along well with [Chimney Imp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chimney Imp).
